body.p: The text of the unaccompanied standard, IAS 12, is contained in Part A of this edition. Its effective date when issued was 1 January 1998. The text of the Basis for Conclusions on IAS 12 is contained in Part C of this edition. This part presents the following documents:

ol.li:
ILLUSTRATIVE EXAMPLES
Examples of temporary differences
Illustrative computations and presentation
